sub_title: Here to help on deciding what Nature Based Carbon Removal Credits benefit your organisation!
summary:
Nature Based Carbon Removal Credits bring life! 

We represent entrepreneurs who, while operating their business activities, simultaneously remove carbon from the atmosphere while at the same time helping companies to reduce their CO2 emissions.
The goal? To reverse global warming, allow our planet to heal and create life!

I have been working in the field of various forms of sustainability for over 20 years. with the aim of creating win-win relationships between the fortunate and less fortunate, the wealthy and the less wealthy. This symbiotic relationship benefits everyone, and above all our planet.

This passion drove me to co-founding Outdoor Albania, where I helped local isolated farmers in rural mountains to create an income by hosting tourists. 
Among other benefits it gave me the opportunity to help local tourism suppliers to gain access to selling their tourism services on the internet.

I remember a conversation I had with a rural self-sustainable farmer who lived in a small village in Northern Albania and how I tried to explain what the internet was. “Like an invisible book with pages in the air, which everyone with a computer can read”  

So, when I was asked by Climate Cleanup if I wanted to join their mission in reversing climate change, It didn't take me long to decide to join them and contribute to their mission;

“Removing CO2 from the atmosphere by doubling nature”- It’s as simple as that!

Almost the same as the times when I was trying to inform local Albanian farmers what the internet was, after all this entire voluntary carbon market hasn't been around for a long time. And many people need help with understanding these concepts. We are helping to do this.

All our projects are accredited by ONCRA, store carbon and create additional benefits related to the millennium development goals. 

If you would like to know more on suitable projects for your nature based carbon credit purchases while being able to establish a personal relationship with these entrepreneurs or just get a better understanding between Onsets or Offsets I would love to connect.


Feel free to contact me!

profile_positions.description:
We represent entrepreneurs who, while operating their business activities, simultaneously remove carbon from the atmosphere while at the same time helping companies to become net positive.
The goal? To reverse global warming, allow our planet to heal and create life while paving the way to a nature based economy.

I have been working in the field of various forms of sustainability for over 20 years. with the aim of creating win-win relationships between the fortunate and less fortunate, the wealthy and the less wealthy. This symbiotic relationship benefits everyone, and above all our planet.

This passion drove me to co-founding Outdoor Albania, where I helped local isolated farmers in rural mountains to create an income by hosting tourists. 
Among other benefits it gave me the opportunity to help local tourism suppliers to gain access to selling their tourism services on the internet.

So, when I was asked by Climate Cleanup if I wanted to join their mission in reversing climate change, It didn't take me long to decide to join them and contribute to their mission;

“Removing CO2 from the atmosphere by doubling nature”- It’s as simple as that!

Almost the same as the times when I was trying to inform local Albanian farmers what the internet was, after all this entire voluntary carbon market hasn't been around for a long time. And many people need help with understanding these concepts. We are helping to do this.

All our projects are accredited by ONCRA, store carbon and create additional benefits related to the millennium development goals. 

If you would like to know more on suitable projects for your nature based carbon credit purchases while being able to establish a personal relationship with these entrepreneurs or just get a better understanding between Onsets or Offsets I would love to connect.


Feel free to contact me!
profile_positions.title: Onsets        Nature-Based Carbon Removal Credit nonsultant

profile_positions.description:
A�fter I finished my studies in Holland (Concept and Brands, 2004), I co-founded the company OA -Outdoor Albania with the intention to promote tourism in a beautiful and at the time little visited country, that was struggling to get past an unjustified negative image. Our product which consist out of hiking tours, cultural tours, cycling tours and other outdoor activities was and is always based on authenticity, and in facilitating poverty reduction by delivering economical benefits even in the most remote corners of the country, throughout the year.
For the last 15 years I worked with passion to make OA-Outdoor Albania a commercial success and font of inspiration to many; setting the standards for the development of the adventure tourism in Albania and Western Balkans.
Together with our team, we managed to create an network of local suppliers, a solid team of skilled tour-leaders and a reliable and well established brand. For more information please visit www.outdooralbania.com
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: Within OA I am responsible for the inhouse tour-leader trainings. We teach our new leaders different skills, such as safety management, public speaking, exceeding expectations as well as for the do's and dont's in the field.
profile_positions.title: Tourleader Trainer

profile_positions.description: 'Al Mosafer' is a travel show, combining culture and adventure tourism featuring destinations all over the world. My role is to design the trip and together with the local producer and the content producer, to make sure that all content can be filmed in the best way possible. Destinations I have produced include Albania, Portugal, Argentine, Ethiopia, Georgia and Vietnam.
profile_positions.title: producer 'Al Mosafer'

profile_positions.description:
"The Via Dinarica promotes active and responsible tourism across the Western Balkans. The trail, which spans nearly 2,000 kilometers, is a cultural corridor and connects countries and communities along the Dinaric Alps and Sharr Mountain Range by spotlighting the region’s landscape and its diverse traditions."
￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼￼The Via Dinarica Alliance is a group of professional outdoor enthusiasts from the Western Balkan
countries of : Albania, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, Kosovo, Macedonia, Montenegro, Serbia and Slovenia. Our passion is showing travelers and outdoor adventure enthusiast like yourself the Via Dinarica, the last hidden outpost in Europe. Together we have over a century of experience leading top-end trips in this remote and stunning region.
Our commitment to the region, its people, and the unique natural habitat is paramount. We strive to make our trips responsible and beneficial to the people and their mountain communities. We act as facilitators between highland communities and the traveler. Making sure that both benefit and learn from each other. Our leaders and guides take great pride in sharing their knowledge about this hidden corner in Europe."
profile_positions.title: Start up member at The Via Dinarica Alliance

profile_positions.description:
From 2008 to 2012 Outdoor Albania was the local MPO ( representative) for World Hotel Link.
For more than ten guesthouses and small scale hotels we build websites with an integrated booking tool. In addition we provided trainings on explaining what the internet is and how to manage bookings within a clear administration.

whl.travel is a wholly owned business unit of the WHL Group and started life as a development project in the Mekong region trying to find a way to get travel product from the developing world online and able to be transacted just as it is in the West. 

Our Values: WHL is committed to win-win-win outcomes for all stakeholders, including staff of WHL and member marketplaces, travellers and local communities. In seeking good outcomes and sustainable practices, WHL policies are in accord with the principles of win-win-win and doing no harm based on:

- Respect and care for individuals 
- Respect for cultures 
- Respect and care for the environment 
- Open and honest management 
- Ongoing learning and transfer of capabilities
profile_positions.title: MPO

company.name: Jazz bennefit concert for a street dog

volunteer_experiences.description: We organised a benefit concert for an Albanian streetdog who was suffering from "leshmanjosa" a terrible disease. He needed internal treatment for one month and another six months of medicine. Together with two other jazz musicians I organised a nice evening with drinks and Jazz music. We managed to take him in to treatment and to give him a pleasant extension on his life.
